control.description: OK, Cancel, and Select All Buttons

controls.control:
List Header 25 0 80 auto
Total Sources Label 50 110 300 40 font14 white left bottom false $INFO[Window().Property(umbrella.total_results)] Total Sources
clearlogo keep 400 0 600 175% $INFO[Window().Property(umbrella.clearlogo)]
_icon
Source Select List list 0 150 1350 800 2001 2000 2000 2000 400 Vertical
Quality Icon RD 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),Real-Debrid)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.useprovidercolors),1)
Quality Icon AD 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),AllDebrid)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)
Quality Icon PM 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),Premiumize)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)
Quality Icon TB 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),TorBox)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)
Quality Icon ED 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),EasyDebrid)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)
Quality Icon OC 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid),Offcloud)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)
Quality Icon Plex 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),PLEXSHARE)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)+String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT)
Quality Icon EasyNews 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),EASYNEWS)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)+String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT)
Quality Icon GDrive 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),GDRIVE)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)+String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT)
Quality Icon FilePursuit 0 0 100 100 left $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon1)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),FILEPURSUIT)+String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),1)+String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT)
Quality Icon 0 0 100 100 left center keep $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.quality_icon)] String.IsEqual(Window().Property(umbrella.usecoloricons),0)
Line1 link name 110 15 1240 25 font13 white left bottom [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]][B]$INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.count)] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.name)][/B][/COLOR] !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),UNCACHED)
Line1 link name-UNCACHED TORRENTS 110 15 1240 25 font13 white left bottom [B]$INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.count)] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.name)][/B] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),UNCACHED)
Line2 cloud file 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),CLOUD)
Line2 cached torrents 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),LOCAL) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),UNCACHED) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),CLOUD)
Line2 uncached torrents 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] SEEDERS: $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.seeders)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),UNCACHED)
Line2 direct or local links, exluding plexshare 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider)] !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),PLEXSHARE) + [String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT) | String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),LOCAL)]
Line2 plexshare links 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.plexsource)] String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider),PLEXSHARE) + [String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT) | String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),LOCAL)]
Line2 hosters 180 50 1170 25 font12 white left top $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.size_label)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.debrid)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.provider)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.source)] [COLOR $INFO[ListItem.Property(umbrella.providerhighlight)]]|[/COLOR] HOSTER !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),UNCHECKED) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),DIRECT) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),LOCAL) + !String.Contains(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),TORRENT) + !String.IsEqual(ListItem.Property(umbrella.source),CLOUD)
